message.original: イリスの身を案じるレオの相談に乗る
ジョゼフから詳しい話を聞く
message.translation: Hear out what Joseph has to say

message.original: 禊の神殿に向かいゾマの村への道を開く
message.translation: Head to the village of Zoma through the Temple of Purification

message.original: ゾマのエリアマスターからイリスの情報を聞く
message.translation: Listen to what the Area Master at Zoma has to say about Iris

message.original: ザンドラ東部の廃墟群へ向かいイリスを探す
message.translation: Find Iris in the Eastern Zandora Ruins

message.original: メッセージに従い丘の上の廃教会へ向かう
message.translation: Head to the ruined chapel on the hill just like in the message

message.original: 謁見の間のレオに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Leo in Audience Chamber
